idea: We are a firm of practicing Company Secretaries providing a gamut of professional services in the areas of Corporate Law, Corporate Governance and Compliance Practices. Our firm is well-equipped to meet the challenges of the dynamic regulatory environment. We not only deal with various Secretarial, Managerial and Procedural Compliances but also appear before and coordinate with various regulatory authorities like The Ministry of Corporate Affairs, The National Company Law Tribunal, The Securities and Exchange Board of India, All Stock Exchanges, The Reserve Bank of India etc. Whilst this remains the core of our business, many firms of Chartered Accountants and Solicitors use our services to ensure that the best advice and assistance on Company Secretarial matters is available to their clients. With our dedicated team of professionals, we endeavour to continuously adhere to the highest professional standards in the field of Corporate Law & Practices
name: KNK AND CO. LLP
